review: We are so glad we bought this when it was on sale for Prime members.  I didn't know much about it when I bought it, but we've loved it.  I wish I could mirror (Airplay) from my iPhone to the Fire TV Stick, but other than that, it's really nice to have and easy to use.
author: Matt

review: Set up was easy  Haven't watched any movies yet.
author: Catherine M. Harper

review: Good fast,  recommend it for customers who plan on sticking with Amazon and tend to buy movies from Amazon often
author: Alan Gomez

review: Very easy to set up and use.
author: Thad J. Gulczynski

review: Has a hard time reaching wireless.  Almost haveto have router right next to stick.
author: Michael Alcanter

review: Easiest set up ever. You plug this in your HDMI port and wall socket. 30 seconds later on your TV screen you will be prompted to enter your WI FI info and you are ready to use!  All apps are free except Netflix which you have to have a paid subscription, Showtime, HBO, radio .....all free. No access to social media apps. You can load and view pictures.
author: SJ

review: I don't know how I've lived without it. Definitely recommend to everyone who has prime!!
author: None

review: Quick, nice interface, easy to use.
author: Viktor Nikitenko

review: It may be due to our ISP but we have experienced difficulty  with every program we have watch ed.  After watching about a quarter of the program, it will buffer and then an error message comes on that says they are experiencing problems with that program, try a again later or choose another program or movie.
author: Jamie A Bennett
